name: 64 Cricket
overview: 64 Cricket is a text based cricked game for 1 player. It was developed by R. Hill and published by Sophisticated Games in 1984. Truly realistic game of skill and luck giving ball by ball commentary of any cricket match-limited overs or double innings. Tactical choices include winning the toss, inspecting the wicket, attacking or defensive batting and bowling, batting order, bowling changes, declarations, follow-ons. All major rules of cricket correctly interpreted. A version of the game was also released for the VIC-20.
